fields.name: CreateOption
fields.description: This enumerates the possible sources of a disk's creation.

fields.name: ElasticSanResourceId
fields.description: Required if createOption is CopyFromSanSnapshot. This is the ARM id of the source elastic san volume snapshot.

fields.name: LogicalSectorSize
fields.description: Logical sector size in bytes for Ultra disks. Supported values are 512 ad 4096. 4096 is the default.

fields.name: PerformancePlus
fields.description: Set this flag to true to get a boost on the performance target of the disk deployed, see here on the respective performance target. This flag can only be set on disk creation time and cannot be disabled after enabled.

fields.name: SecurityDataUri
fields.description: If createOption is ImportSecure, this is the URI of a blob to be imported into VM guest state.

fields.name: SourceResourceId
fields.description: If createOption is Copy, this is the ARM id of the source snapshot or disk.

fields.name: SourceUniqueId
fields.description: If this field is set, this is the unique id identifying the source of this resource.

fields.name: SourceUri
fields.description: If createOption is Import, this is the URI of a blob to be imported into a managed disk.

fields.name: StorageAccountId
fields.description: Required if createOption is Import. The Azure Resource Manager identifier of the storage account containing the blob to import as a disk.

fields.name: UploadSizeBytes
fields.description: If createOption is Upload, this is the size of the contents of the upload including the VHD footer. This value should be between 20972032 (20 MiB + 512 bytes for the VHD footer) and 35183298347520 bytes (32 TiB + 512 bytes for the VHD footer).
